msg_deepscan: Scan all running processes, even system processes.
prompt_deleting: Are you sure want to delete this item?
prompt_new: Are you sure want to create new script?
prompt_undo: Are you sure want to undo all changes?
KEY_UP_help: When releasing a keyboard button. Input key should be in upper case alphabet.
KEY_DOWN_help: When holding down a keyboard button. Input key should be in upper case alphabet.
KEY_PRESS_help: When press a button and then release. Input key should be in upper case alphabet.
LEFT_DOWN_help: When user hold the left mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
LEFT_UP_help: When user release the left mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
LEFT_CLICK_help: When user attempt to click left mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
RIGHT_DOWN_help: When user hold the right mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
RIGHT_UP_help: When user release the left mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
RIGHT_CLICK_help: When user attempt to click right mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate.
LEFT_DBCLICK_help: When user attempt to double click left mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate
RIGHT_DBCLICK_help: When user attempt to double right-click mouse button. Input should be a mouse coordinate
ENTER_TEXT_help: Helps user enter a text. Input should be any text.
ENTER_SECRET_help: Helps user enter a text, but will never display. Input should be any text.
RANDOM_TEXT_help: Helps user enter a random string, each string should be separate by a semicolon (;).
DO_NOTHING_help: Do nothing and wait until reach the offset.
msg_short_pass: Password is too short, atleast {0} characters is required.
msg_success_pass: New password has been set successfully.
msg_language_changed: App's language has been changed. Please restart the application to take effect.
msg_script_isplaying: The Autoquit is playing scripts, are you sure want to terminate and exit?
msg_incompatible_app: Incompatible application. If you continue, respective resolution will be disabled.
msg_sendinput:
Allow manipulate user input for some application do not support no-input mode. 
Double-click to check/uncheck all.

Warning: Only use 1 instance while using this mode.
FormatException: This column does not support this format.
msg_noinput_mode:
No-input mode allow the automation happens without staying focus on 
the main window's process. 
Disable will allow user to use Manipulate Mode.
